actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that total new budget authority for fiscal year 1976 shall not exceed the total budget outlays for fiscal year 1975 by more than 3 percent.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that total new budget authority for fiscal year 1976 shall not exceed the total budget outlays for fiscal year 1975 by more than 3 percent.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that total new budget authority for fiscal year 1976 shall not exceed the total budget outlays for fiscal year 1975 by more than 3 percent.
